lyrics.stanza: The love of Christ is now constraining me That I would love and love Him utterly. His mighty love has touched me deep within To consecrate my life and all to Him.
His dying love so compelling, And this tide has made me willing To love Him, I can't help but love Him.
The love of Christ Is now constraining me to love Him utterly. His mighty love Has touched me deep within to consecrate to Him.
This tide of love Has flowed to me from Him that keeps on rushing in. Now I'm for Him Beyond my own control; He's now my final goal.
His dying love so compelling, And this tide has made me willing To love Him, I can't help but love Him.
